card_usp: Earn 5X Membership Rewards® points on flights booked through AmexTravel.com, on up to $500K in purchases per calendar year. Enjoy benefits across travel, entertainment, and dining.
reward_points: 5X on flights booked directly with airlines or through American Express Travel, on up to $500,000 on these purchases per calendar year.
rewards: $200 Hotel Credit, $240 Digital Entertainment Credit, $200 Airline Fee Credit, $200 Uber Cash, $100 Saks Fifth Avenue Credit, $199 CLEAR® Plus Credit, Hilton Honors Gold Status, Marriott Bonvoy Gold Elite Status, $300 Equinox Credit & SoulCycle At-Home Bike Credit, TSA PreCheck or Global Entry Credit.
features: Access to The American Express Global Lounge Collection, 24/7 Concierge Service, Travel Insurance, Purchase Protection, Return Protection, Extended Warranty, Trip Cancellation and Interruption Insurance, Baggage Insurance Plan, No Foreign Transaction Fees.
welcome_benefit: AS HIGH AS 175,000 Membership Rewards® points after you spend $8,000 in purchases on your new Card within the first 6 months of Card Membership.
lounge_access: Complimentary access to 1,400+ lounges in over 500 airports across 650+ cities.
concierge_service: 24/7 Concierge Service available for travel bookings.
insurance: Travel Insurance, Car Rental Insurance, Baggage Insurance Plan, Trip Cancellation and Interruption Insurance.
fraud_protection: Zero liability if reported within 24 hours.
full_card_description: This card offers premium travel, shopping, and lifestyle benefits, including lounge access, high rewards, and robust insurance, making it ideal for frequent travelers.
terms_and_conditions: All dues must be paid on time; rewards program subject to change.

card_usp: Welcome Gift of 4,000 Bonus Membership Rewards® Points
annual_fee_waiver: 100% waived off if total spends on American Express Credit Card in the immediately preceding membership year is Rs. 1,50,000 and above; else 50% annual membership renewal fee will be waived off if total spends on American Express Credit Card in the immediately preceding membership year is Rs. 90,000 to Rs. 1,49,999.
rewards_program: Earn 1 Membership Rewards® Point for every Rs. 50 spent except for spend on Fuel, Insurance, Utilities, Cash Transactions and EMI conversion at Point of Sale.
spend_based_reversal: Annual fee reversed if spends > ₹1.5 lakh/year.
reward_points: 1 Membership Rewards Point for every Rs. 50 spent.
rewards: Bonus Membership Rewards Points for spending milestones.
features: 24X7 Card Related Assistance, Zero lost Card liability, Emergency Card Replacement, Contactless Payment.
welcome_benefit: 4,000 Bonus Membership Rewards Points on spending INR 15,000 within first 90 days of Cardmembership.
milestone_benefit: 1,000 Bonus Membership Rewards Points for spending INR 20,000 or more in a calendar month.
bonus_points: 1,000 Bonus Membership Rewards Points for using your card 4 times on transactions of Rs. 1,500 or above in a calendar month.
fuel_benefits: 0% convenience fee on fuel purchase at HPCL for transactions less than Rs. 5,000 and 1% convenience fee on fuel purchases per transaction of Rs. 5,000 and above.
dining_benefits: Exciting discounts of up to 20% at select restaurants.
fraud_protection: Zero lost Card liability if reported within 3 working days.
full_card_description: The American Express Membership Rewards Credit Card offers Membership Rewards points to spend on dining, shopping and travel. Apply today to know more!
eligibility_criteria: Resident Indian, Personal Annual Income of Rs. 6 Lakhs and above, Over 18 years of age, Good credit history, Current/permanent residential address in India.
terms_and_conditions: All dues must be paid on time; rewards program subject to change.
